question: Which technology company has partnered with AICTE to train students in new-age technologies?
explanation:
Technology giant Microsoft announced that it has partnered with All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) to train students and educators in new-age technologies.
Microsoft's learning resource centre ‘Microsoft Learn’ has been integrated with the ELIS platform, the e-learning portal of AICTE to make available over 1,500-course modules of Microsoft to the students and educators at free of cost.
